ref.mixed-citation: Wang Y, Jiang W, He Q, Wang C, Wang B, Zhou P, et al. Early, low-dose and short-term application of corticosteroid treatment in patients with severe COVID-19 pneumonia: single-center experience from Wuhan, China. medRxiv. Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Press; 2020b;2020.03.06.20032342. This article pointed out the utility of low-dose and short-term corticosteroids applications for COVID-19 treatment.
